mhframework

Class MHRuntimeMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • mhframework.MHRuntimeMetrics

  • public class MHRuntimeMetrics
extends java.lang.Object
    This class borrows logic and code from the book Killer Game Programming in Java by Andrew Davison.
    Author:
    Michael Henson

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long PERIOD
      Average period in nanoseconds required to achieve the target frame rate.
